li.label: Fire glow patch
li.tooltip: Removes the fireglow comp from fires improving performance at the cost of disabling light emission

li.label: Aggressive Mothballing
li.tooltip: Enables aggressive mothballing allowing pawns that normally wouldn't mothball to mothball increasing performance depending on the amount of unmothballed pawns there are./n/n WARNING: This patch can cause raiders to reappear and suddenly die from bleeding out since Placebo forces them to mothball despite their life-threatening injuries.
